name: Goosebumps: Halloween Rises
description:
Goosebumps: Halloween Rises
Goosebumps: Halloween Rises | Developed by @-Cinematic- This project has been reshared with a new title and multiple changes to music, sounds, and art. This is a short little exploration game inspired by GOOSEBUMPS 2! After Sonny and Sam go on another junk collecting adventure, they stumble across the wooden ventriloquist dummy, SLAPPY, from the popular children's book series GOOSEBUMPS. See GOOSEBUMPS 2: HAUNTED HALLOWEEN in theaters OCTOBER 12TH! Controls: ➤ W, A, S, and D to move ➤ MOUSE to look around ➤ E to interact ➤ SPACE to continue Credits ➤ Music from: Goosebumps: The Game (2015) ➤ Story from: Goosebumps 2: Haunted Halloween (2018) ➤ Based upon the best-selling book series by R. L. Stine
